item.description:

item.title: By: Marcelo Park
item.dc:creator: Marcelo Park
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/01/six-good-practices-that-have-improved-our-team-productivity-plataforma-tec-full-version/comment-page-1/#comment-1082">Junio Vitorino</a>.
Hi Junio, tks! We use different agile approaches depending on the project. But we are very comfortable running projects with Scrum and Kanban.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Junio Vitorino.

Hi Junio, tks! We use different agile approaches depending on the project. But we are very comfortable running projects with Scrum and Kanban.

item.title: By: Junio Vitorino
item.dc:creator: Junio Vitorino
item.description: Great post. I'd like ask something. In a brief stretch you cite some scrum lights. You'd say that Plataforma consider yourself as an agile company? What's official agile approach are you using?
item.content:encoded: Great post. I’d like ask something. In a brief stretch you cite some scrum lights. You’d say that Plataforma consider yourself as an agile company? What’s official agile approach are you using?

item.title: By: Chuck J Hardy

item.description: Good to see how another creative company does business. Well done and have a good year
item.content:encoded: Good to see how another creative company does business. Well done and have a good year
